comments.comment:
Dear Mr.Mohomad (can we call Mohomad Aiya in Sinhala way to respect people we love), as our group posted earlier also, it's very ugly, and brutal that fu.....g Wasantha doc guy (better to give that director post to a dog as dogs know the grativity much better than f.....g Wasantha guy) posted his dark side by insulting Mohomad Aiya. It's NOT acceptable at all!!, a member of so called majority (percentage wise only) Sinhala guy ( most of our group are Sinhala guys) should never condemn a member of our Sri¬† Lankan minority (percentage wise only, all Sri Lankans are equal) in any form of filthy language.¬†

Is that Wasantha bastard a doctor??. (We must reply in his own style even we should not bite the dog's leg, when the dog bite us, and also not acceptable.
 That guy (doc), Director, must be brought into book, and be punished for the crimes (yes, insulting anybody is a crime) that filthy doc had committed.

Mr. Mohomad had done a very good project, the benefits are not only for S.L.Muslim community, but for all Sri Lankans.

Greedy docs are against for any good deed, if their black money inflow is affected, it's clear now.

We thank Mr.Mohomad for this fund raising project, and beg your pardon for the unpleasant language (That dirty doc insults our Sinhala community and language by abusing our mother tongue) used by fraudulent doc, on behalf of peace & inter comminity loving all Sri Lankans.

Our group (95% Sinhala Buddhist fellows) wish you and your son the best of health!!

We are sure Mighty God will bless your family, & your team for the good deeds you guys have initiated.

May the TRIPLE GEMS BLESS you guys for your family's and your teams' efforts to help cancer patients who are helpless in multiple ways!!! (Buddhist Philosophy does not descriminate any religious person).
comments.author: Richy Safety Advisors
